text: Vin takym chynom duped yim z brekhneyu. Yak tilʹky vony pokushtuvaly derevo, yikhni orhanizatsiyi staly pomitnym yim, ta vony postaralysya nakryty sebe z lystamy Rayu. Yikhniy Lord zaklykav na nykh: ya ne nakazav vam z shcho derevu, ta poperedyly vas shcho chort ye vash naybilʹsh revnyy voroh
